FuncDef: This command creates a PIM interface.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the IP interface. Interface names must be unique within the group of defined IP interfaces for config router interface, config service ies interface, and config service ies subscriber-interface group-interface commands. An interface name cannot be in the form of an IP address. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on.), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes. Values-1 to 32 alphanumeric characters..

ExtraInfo: Default: No interfaces or names are defined within PIM.
